                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Kunbalakkundjangara

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Rough leafed bloodwood; flowers may be white, pink or red, used for making didjeridus or mako.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Scientific nameCorymbia setosa

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            The roots of a plant.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Warradjan kangun kunbak dja mandjimdjim mandedjmad.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The pig-nosed turtle eats water weeds and the roots of water pandanus.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            LanguageKunwinjku,Kundjeyhmi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Other languagesKuninjku,Kune = dedjmadno

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Waterlily, specifically the white-flowered waterlily and the edible corms of these waterlilies.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            SynonymsI= burdbarrk

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Nahni mayhmayh kangeyo karrekuyengkuyeng karrinan kore manlabbarl manlabbarlkimuk kore mandem manwern kadi. Karrinan mandem kunworr kamelhmelme bu kare.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The bird called karrekuyengkuyeng (Jacana) can be found at large billabongs where there are lots of waterlilies. We see them walking over the lily-pads.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Truck, car, motor vehicle.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Synonymsmuddika

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Wurdwurd birriwam Kunkanginj wanjh birrikoluy kore mandengeyi wanjh birriwam birrihdirri kabbal.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The children went to Kunkanginj, got out of the car and went to play on the floodplain.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              (Narndal, Julie and Namarnyilk, Lois, 'Kuhni bu birriwam ngalmangiyi', Gunbalanya)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Urine, piss.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              LanguageKunwinjku,Kundjeyhmi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Other languagesKuninjku,Kune = dileno

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              -dilebun

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Urinate, piss.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Cycad, cycad damper.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Scientific nameCycas armstrongii

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Mandirnku kadulkdi kore kunred kubolkwern.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                There are cycad trees in many different clan lands.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              1Straight.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                2Proper, correct.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Mandjad ngarrbenbukkan wanjh mandjad kabirriyime kore school, bu kabirridurrkmirri, kabirribimbun, kabirribimnan, dja baleh yarrkka.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  We show them the right way of doing things, so they will do the right thing at school, when they're working, writing or reading, and all those things.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Quoted in Etherington, Steve, 'Learning to be Kunwinjku: Kunwinjku people discuss their pedagogy', PhD Thesis, Charles Darwin University, 2006)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • djendjad

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  one who speaks well, many languages or learns language easily.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                -dengedjad

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  good kicker (football).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Red bush apple tree.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Synonymsdjarduk

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Scientific nameSyzygium suborbiculare

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Mandjarduk karridulknan kadulkdi mandulkwern kore manberrk.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  We see a lot of red apple trees in open forest areas.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Other languagesKundedjnjenghmi = andjarduk

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Kunbalakdjangarakurdadj

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Kunbalakdjerrkudmiken.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1Rain.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Mandjewk nganbom ngadberre.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The rain fell on us.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Mandjewk kamankan nganbowon kukku.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The rain falls and gives me water.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Wildflower Band, 'Maburrinj (The lonely place called Maburrinj)', from the Album 'Manginburru Bininj', Skinnyfish Music, 2009)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                2Year (as measure of time).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Bu mandjewkbubuyika ngarre bininj kabirridowkke mako manmim lead kawernmerren kore kulabbahlabbarl.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  After a number of years, people firing shotguns constantly will lead to an accumulation of lead in the billabong.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Kunbalakman-djil

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                GrammarTakes na- class agreement: na-kimuk 'big rain'.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Water pandanus tree.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Scientific namePandanus aquaticus

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Mandjimdjim kadjordmen kore kukku kaboyo kore mankabo manwanjdjad manlabbarl.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Mandjimdjim (water pandanus) grows where there is water, by rivers, creeks and billabongs.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                LanguageKuninjku,Kune,Kunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Other languagesKundedjnjenghmi,Kundjeyhmi = andjimdjim

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Kunbalakkun-yaril

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Kind of common yellow-flowering acacia.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Scientific nameAcacia difficilis

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Other languagesKundedjnjenghmi,Kundjeyhmi = andjoh

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  -midjohdjodjo

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Grove of Acacia difficilis, wattle scrub.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  -djohbun

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Strip acacia bark (usually to make string)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Olive Python.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Scientific nameLiasis olivaceus

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Kunbalakngalwirnyi.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Yellow dye tree.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Synonymsmankurrudjumuk (I)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Scientific namePogonolobus reticulatus

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      LanguageKundedjnjenghmi= ankurrudjumuk

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Purple currant tree, kind of shrub or small tree (usually 2-3 m) which has edible dark purple berries.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Scientific nameAntidesma ghaesembilla

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Bu kudjewk karrire wanjh karrihmang manu mandjurrukkumarlba.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        In the wet season we go and collect Antidesma ghaesembilla berries.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Narndal, Julie et. al. 'Manme: Stories about food - Kunwinjku', Oenpelli Literature Production Centre, 1982)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Other languagesKuninjku = mandjulukkurnmarlbam, Kundjeyhmi = andjurrukumarlba

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Ironwood.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Scientific nameErythrophleum chlorostachys

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Dja bu birridoweni wanjh birrimangi kunworr mandubang birrirurrkwolngwoni kundolng dorrengh manbu kunrurrk kore yongohyoy.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        And when someone died, then people would get leaves from the ironwood tree and smoke the place that person used to live in.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Kunbalakdjirrpara

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Green plum tree (taller variety, shorter variety is called fv:(m)an-wodberr).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Synonymsmanwodberr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Scientific nameBuchanania obovata

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Korroko bu ngarriyawani mandudjmi ngarrimangi ngarridahkendongi kundjabarrk.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        In the old days when we used to look for green plums, we would put them in a dilly bag.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Peter Carroll AIATSIS collection)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      LanguageKuninjku,Kunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Other languagesKundedjnjenghmi,Kundjeyhmi = andudjmi, Kune = manmoyi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Kunbalakmankordildil

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      1Song.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Manbu karrbarda mandule dja kunborrk bu korroko nakudji nakohbanj dabbolk Nakangila Nabarrbinj marnbom.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        An old Nakangila skin man of the Barrbinj clan made the Long Yam song and dance, a long time ago.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation. )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      2Accent in speech.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Bedda mandulebuyika kabirriwokdi.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Those people have a different accent in the way they talk.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      -dulebukkan

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Teach someone a song , reveal a song to someone.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      1Hill, mountain, elevated landform.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Benewam kore mandulum kabolkngeyo Mankarrinjdji darnkih Warruwi.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        They went to a hill called Mankarrinjdji near Warruwi.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation. )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        -manduluhdulum

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Mound, heap.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        That previously referred to, that known topic of discourse (agrees with vegetable class nouns).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Get, obtain, collect.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Kunbalak-modme

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            --yimang

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Take something off someone.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Macassan.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Saltwater, ocean, sea.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Synonymskurrula

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                LanguageKundedjnjenghmi, Kundjeyhmi, Kunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                This one here (agrees with vegetable class nouns).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Mahni mirridjdjin yingun ba bu ngunkurlbamarnbun dja mak wurdyaw ke kadjordmen.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  You should take these tablets to make your blood strong and help your baby grow properly.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Garde, Murray (ed.), 'Bininj Gunwok talk about health : medical terms and vocabulary for health professionals', Gundjeihmi Aboriginal Corporation, Jabiru, 2010)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Magpie goose, pied goose.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Scientific nameAnseranus semipalmata
