                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Other languagesKuninjku =murnubbarr, Kundjeyhmi = bamurru

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Kunbalakkarlko

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Express affection or gratitude.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Birribekkang danginj Balang birrimwokngimeng birrimanjbom.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    When they heard that Balang was born they telephoned to express affection for him.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Water course, creek.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Bedda Nakorrkko benekabokurrmeng.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    The Nakorrkko ancestors placed the creek there.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Other languagesKuninjku,Kune = kabono

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Grammarincorporable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  1Fall, fall down.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Bedda benenang kunwardderurrk wanjh benelobmeng kumekke benengimeng, dja mandjewk dedjdjingmey mankamankani.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    They saw a cave, ran towards it and went in, just as the rain was starting to fall.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (Nganjmirra, Nawakadj, 'Kunwinjku Spirit', Melbourne University Press, 1997)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  2Land (of aircraft).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    See alsokukmankan

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Peanut tree or red-fruited kurrajong. The tree grows in rainforest and vine thickets, up to 10m tall, flowers are greenish-white in kurrung to kurrung seasons. The name refers to both the tree and the edible seeds from the orange seed pods. There are up to 8 edible seeds in the pods which are similar in taste to peanuts.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Scientific nameSterculia quadrifida

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Benehbarndi kore kundulk kaddum mankarrarlhmanj manmim benehmimnguni.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The two of them were sitting up in the tree eating mankarralarlhmanj nuts.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation. )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    LanguageKundjeyhmi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Other languagesKuninjku = mankongko

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Kind of rock country spinifex , 'kerosene grass'

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Scientific nameTriodia microstachia

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Nungka barrk yika kayo kure mi-karrarndalk dja mi-ngarre.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Sometimes black wallaroos sleep in the spinifex and in thickets.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    LanguageKuninjku,Kunwinjku,Kune

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Other languagesKundedjnjenghmi,Kundjeyhmi = ankarrarndalk

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    1Custom, manner.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Scientific nameKunibidji minj kabindiberddadjdje, mankarre bedberre.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      2Culture, law.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        3Ceremony, song.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Kakarrerawon.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          He will participate in his second ceremony (lit: 3s.+ceremony+add on).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        4Message, news.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          See alsokun-dulkarre

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Kunbalakkun-darok

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Grammarincorporable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          -karrebakke

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Break the law.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          -karremarnbun

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Make a law, make a decision, make a song.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          -karrewernwon

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Go through many ceremonies.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Vagina.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Other languagesKuninjku = mankirh

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Cheeky yam— so called because of toxins in the edible tuber which must first be removed by leaching. The yam is sliced thinly (traditionally with a blade made from the shoulder bone of a macropod), and placed into a string bag which is then immersed into a flowing watercourse overnight or longer. The toxin-free slices are then cooked and eaten.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Nawu dabborrabbolk nawu nayuhyungki korrokoni birribimbuni mayh nawu bim yiman kayime kunj, ngurrurdu, ngalmangeyi dja mak djenj. Dja manme warridj yiman kayime kayawal, mankinjdjek dja njalehnjale manmebuyika manu.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Those early ancestors a very long time ago painted images of animals such as kangaroos, emus, long neck turtles and fish. They also painted (in rock shelters) images of vegetable foods such as long yams (Dioscorea transversa), cheeky yams (Dioscorea transversa) and other kinds of foods.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Paperbark tree, tea-tree, Melaleuca (generic term).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Scientific nameMelaleuca spp. (generic)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Nahni Wakkewakken kabirriyo kore kundulk mankod kore kukabo kore manbokedjelk.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              The Wakkewakken spirits live among the paperbark trees in the river, in the cold water.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Kunbalakkun-burlburl

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Tuberous aquatic perennial with mainly submerged leaves and edible nutty corms, 'water peanut'

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Scientific nameAponogeton elongatus

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              LanguageKuninjku,Kune,Kunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Other languagesKundedjnjenghmi,Kundjeyhmi = ankodjbang, Kdj synonym= anbidjoh

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Kunbalakman-bordengkekorrongko

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Star.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Synonymskinhkinh

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Bu karrire kumunun wanjh mankokkarrng kanwolkan kabolkwolkan kore karrire.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                When we are travelling in the dark the stars give us light, they light up the ground where we are walking.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              1Spear or spear shaft, more specifically a spear made with a shaft made from Arnhem Land bamboo Bambusa arnhemica.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Kuni kunkare nakudji bininj wam kabbal, kani bokenh mankole dja borndok.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                One day a long time ago a man went to the floodplain, he was carrying two spears and a spearthrower.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                (Manakgu, Andrew, 'Kuhni bu Kunkare Birrihwarlbuni', Oenpelli Literature Production Centre, 1974)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              2Arnhem Land bamboo.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Scientific nameBambusa arnhemica

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Other languagesKune = koleno, Kundjeyhmi = ankole

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Kunbalakbokkardji

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Grammarincorporable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Climbing vine with a white flower that opens between dusk and dawn. Has an edible tuber, sometimes called a "bush potato" in English. Grows amongst spear grass, often climbing up the stems.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Scientific nameIpomoea graminea

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Korroko nawu kohbakohbanj nawu morlehmorlenj birrirey birrikarungi manbu mankongkong. Birriwilkdengi mandjoleng ngandiwoni ngarringuni.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  In the past, the old women used to go and dig up bush potatoes. They'd put them in the hot coals, and give us the cooked ones to eat.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1Raw, uncooked (of plant-based food).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Yiddok mahni karringun mankuk?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Can we eat this raw?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Quoted in Etherington, Steve, 'Learning to be Kunwinjku: Kunwinjku people discuss their pedagogy', PhD Thesis, Charles Darwin University, 2006 )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                2Not ripe, unripe.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Mankurndalh ngarrinan mannguy bu kanguybun, wanjh darnkih bu kakukdangen mankuk manme.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  We see the black plum tree flowering, and not long afterwards young (unripe) fruits appear.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Other languagesKune, Kuninjku = kukno

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                See alsomandjoleng

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Spike rush and edible corms.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                SynonymsI= mewo

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Scientific nameEleocharis dulcis

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Mankuladj kadjordmen kore kabbal. Morlehmorlenj dja yawkyawk wurdwurd kabirrire kore kabbal kabirrikarung mankuladj.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Spike rushes grow on the floodplain. Women, girls and children go to the floodplain to dig up the corms.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                LanguageKuninjku, Kunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Other languagesKundedjnjenghmi, Kundjeyhmi = ankurladj

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Kunbalakman-dayhmornmorndi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Wild honey, sugar bag (generic).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Kunbalakman-wuybbinj

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Supernatural power, mainly to heal but also to be able to see spirit beings or to compose new songs through supernatural revelation.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Minj ngad karrinan nawu Nakurrurndilhba birridjalkudji kabirrinan nawu marrkidjbu nawu birrikurdang.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    We can't see Nakurrurndilhba spirits, only clever men with special powers can see them.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation. )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  -nakurdangyi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    'Clever man', spiritual healer.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  -ngalkurdangyi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    'Clever woman', spiritual healer.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Sand palm.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Scientific nameLivistona humilis

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Manbu mankurlurrudj makka kundulk manme kamarnbun bu Kurrung wanjh kurdukadji karrinan kare kamimngun manbu makurlurrudj manme manmim.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • The sand palm (Livistona humilis) fruits in the dry season, and we see emus eating the seeds.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  LanguageKuninjku,Kunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Other languagesKuninjku = marrabbi, djendek, Kundjeyhmi,Kundedjnjenghmi = ankulurrudj

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Kind of medium sized tree (7-12m) with edible black berries available late dry to wet season.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Scientific nameVitex glabrata

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Mankurndalh birribarndiwirrinj kamwakemeninj birriyameninj. Manekke ngayameng wanjh barnambarl.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    They would stand up high in the Vitex_glabrata tree and when [the emu] came wandering over [to eat the fallen fruit] they would spear it. I speared one from up in a tree, a technique called barnambarl.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  LanguageKunwinjku, Kuninjku, Kune

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Other languagesKundedjnjenghmi, Kundjeyhmi = ankurndalh
