                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1Major regional ceremony associated with both duwa and yirridjdja moieties.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2Fine cross hatching designs relating to the Mardayin ceremony.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Small freshwater shrimp from the Arnhem Land plateau.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Scientific nameMacrobrachium bullatum

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Pandanus mats used by women as skirts. The word also commonly refers to flat pandanus mats made for sale in recent times as decorative art objects, often coloured with natural dyes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Nawu marebu nakka nakimuk mat kabirrimarnbun. Daluhdaluk kabirrire kunngobarn kabirrimang dja kundulk manbu mandjarnngal kabirrikan kabirrikardmang manbu kunngobarn kahdjabdi manekke kabirrimang.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                A "marebu" is a big mat which people make. Women go and get pandanus, they take a forked stick along so they can hook the pandanus leaves with it [and pull them down], the straight leaves that stand upright.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Scorpion.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Marla nakka nabang bu kanbaye dja kandong kunberd ngalengarre.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Scorpions are dangerous if they bite you, they strike you with their tail.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation.)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              1Malevolent spirit being, ghost.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                2Name of a song set performed in Kuninjku and Kunbarlang languages. Also associated with song sets called mimih 'rock spirit' or mimih 'young woman/mermaid'.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  1Make, build, create.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Korroko dabborrabbolk birrimarnbuni mandjabu.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    In the old days, people used to make fish traps.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Nungkah marnbom manekke Ubarr, nungkah marnbom Yirrbardbard.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    He created the Ubarr ceremony, Yirrbardbard created it.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (Nganjmirra, Nawakadj, 'Kunwinjku Spirit', Melbourne University Press, 1997)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  2 Do, complete a task or activity.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Ngarrimarnbuni ngadberre lesson.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    We would do our lessons.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (Quoted in Etherington, Steve, 'Learning to be Kunwinjku: Kunwinjku people discuss their pedagogy', PhD Thesis, Charles Darwin University, 2006)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  3Fix, heal.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Muddikang ngarduk warreminj, ngakan kore mechanic kabirrimarnbun.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    My car has broken down, I'll take it to the mechanic and they will fix it.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Nga-kodj-wurrkmeng marrkidjbu kam-wam ngan-kodj-karrmeng ngan-marnbom.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    I had an object inside my head and the clever man took hold of my head and healed me.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  4Organise or start an event.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Disco kabirrimarnbun and wurdwurd nawu birrikilehkilelh, yawkyawk, yawurrinj kabirridjalngimen rowk kore disco.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    They organise discos, and little children, young girls and boys all go to them.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (Quoted in Etherington, Steve, 'Learning to be Kunwinjku: Kunwinjku people discuss their pedagogy', PhD Thesis, Charles Darwin University, 2006)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Dja kore mulil kabirrikarrme kabirrimarnbun wanjh kunrodjbe kabirribarurren bininj dja daluk.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    When they have ceremonies, men and women (sometimes) paint themselves with red ochre.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  5Cause, make something happen, make someone do something, make something a certain way.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Namarrkon kamarnbun kangurdulme kamayhke dja kandong bininj.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Namarrkon makes it thunder and creates lightning and strikes people.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (Nganjmirra, Nawakadj, 'Kunwinjku Spirit', Melbourne University Press, 1997)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Dangrayekni nakka ngarrirey nganmarnbuni ngarridalkdurrkmangi kore nungka yoy, kundalk.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    He was tough that man, we used to go and he would make us pull up weeds at his place.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (Quoted in Etherington, Steve, 'Learning to be Kunwinjku: Kunwinjku people discuss their pedagogy', PhD Thesis, Charles Darwin University, 2006)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Nawu bininj dja balanda kabirrimang nawu mayh wanjh kabirrikelebukwon kakelebukmen kabirrimarnbun kelebuk mayh bedberre.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Both Aboriginal and non-Aboriginal people get animals and tame them, they make their animals tame.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  -marnburren

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Transfigure oneself, make oneself into something else.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Dugong.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Synonymsmurnun

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    1Verb prefix which expresses that an action is done for the benefit of someone else, or to their detriment. Can often be translated as 'for', as in 'She brought it for me'.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Kanmarneka manbu kunyarl.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Bring that rope for me.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      (Nganjmirra, Nawakadj, 'Kunwinjku Spirit', Melbourne University Press, 1997, 'Biyuk Biyuk' story. )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Nja, ten dollar djalbonj, wardi kanmarneyakwon.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Here you are, here's ten dollars and that's enough, or you'll clean me out.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      (Evans, Nicholas (ed.), How to write Kundjeyhmi, prepared for the National Parks and Wildlife Service and the Gagudju Association.)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Ngalngayeng kawarre nganmarnedoweng korroko ngarribarrkbombarrkbom. Ngurrimray karrimarnenalkbun.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      (words to a song) My daughter has died, we have been grieving all through the night until dawn. Come all of you and let us wail for her.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    2

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Grammaran applicative expressing a beneficiary or maleficiary role

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      -marnedi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Pray (used in Christian religious contexts only).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      -marneyolyolme

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Prefix used to emphasise that an action affects or relates to a particular person or thing. E.g. bebmeng (he appeared) vs bimarnebebmeng (he appeared before him, he turned up to see her etc).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      -marnebebme

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Appear in front of someone.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      -marnenalkbun

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Cry for a deceased person.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      1Want somebody.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Ngunmarnedjare ngunewokdi.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        She wants to talk to you.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      2Love somebody, desire somebody.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1Tell someone, say to someone.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Minj kandiwokbekkan bu karrbenhmarneyime.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          They just don't listen when we tell them.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          (Quoted in Etherington, Steve, 'Learning to be Kunwinjku: Kunwinjku people discuss their pedagogy', PhD Thesis, Charles Darwin University, 2006)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2Call kin X, address someone as X.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Ngudda korlonj yimarneyime.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          You call him 'korlonj' (son).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          (Quoted in Etherington, Steve, 'Learning to be Kunwinjku: Kunwinjku people discuss their pedagogy', PhD Thesis, Charles Darwin University, 2006)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Ngalbu daluk yika wurdyaw ngarrimarneyime ngalkomkudji bu benedanginj karrowen kayakmen.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          We call a woman or girl 'ngalkomkudji' if her sibling passes away.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Seagull.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Scientific nameLarus novaehollandiae

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Whistling kite.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Scientific nameMilvus sphenurus

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Marry.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Ngayi Balang nganemarrinj.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Balang and I got married.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Open, open up, break open.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Wanjh birriwam birrikinjeng, djolengminj, birrimarrhmey birringuneng, birriworrkminj, birridokmeng kured.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              They went and cooked them [the long-necked turtles], and when they were cooked they broke them open and ate until they were full, and then went home.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              (Maralngurra, Rachel, 'Wurdwurd Bedberre', C.M.S, Gunbalanya, 1974)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            -dangmarrhmang

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Open (a door, lid, window, mouth etc.)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Man with special supernatural power.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Synonymsnakurdang, marrngkidj

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Obey, pay attention to what someone says and do what they say.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Synonymswokmarrkmang

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Njaleken yimarrkmang, kakurren nakkan, ngunwurrhke.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Why do you do what he says, he's lying, deceiving you.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Happy.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                See alsomarrmarrni

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Eel-tailed catfishes but only smaller specimens. The name bikurr or bikurr refers to larger specimens.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Scientific nameNeoarius ater

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Namardaka nakimuk dja marrngunj nayahwurd.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  "Namardaka" is a large catfish, and "marrngunj" is a small one.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Nakimuk marrngunj kukbulerri nakka duwa, dja nayahwurd marrngunj kukbele nakka yirridjdja.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Large black juvenile catfish belong to the Duwa moiety, and smaller white ones are Yirridjdja.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Kunbalaknakeryi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Palm sp. The growth apex is cut out and eaten as 'cabbage'. Water containers are made from the basal sheaths of old fronds. Leaves of young plants may be eaten raw.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Scientific nameHydriastele ramsayi
