                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Other languagesKuninjku = kolng

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Be hungry.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Kunbalakmarrwulngayirrihme

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    A kin term which means different things across the Bininj Kunwok dialect chain. In most dialects: 1. father's father and that person's siblings 2. a man's son's child 3. a woman's brother's son's child. Parallel patrilineal grandkin might be another way of saying this. Some Kundjeyhmi speakers call their mother's mother's brother mawah and speakers of Mayali at Manyallaluk don't use the term mawah at all but rather all parallel grandkin (father's father, father's father's sister, mother's mother, mother's mother's brother) are called mawah.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Forebears, more immediate human ancestors as opposed to mythological ancestors. Emphasis is placed on the direct patriarchal lineage [mawah = father's father and his siblings], but the term can also be used more generally.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Ngabenmarneyolyolme nawu ngaye ngabenbornang. Ngaldahdaluk, narahrangem ngabenmarneyolyolme about baleh birrikukyimi nawu mawahmawah kabirriyime bedda, mawah nawu kabirriyime nawu kabirriyime nawu ngaldahdaluk.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        I'm teaching my children, daughters and sons, as I raise them I'm telling them what their forebears were like, who they refer to as "mawahmawah". They call the women that too.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Quoted in Etherington, Steve, 'Learning to be Kunwinjku: Kunwinjku people discuss their pedagogy', PhD Thesis, Charles Darwin University, 2006 )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      See alsodabborrabbolk

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      1Become lost, confused, dazed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Konda nuk ngandibawong ngamayahmayahme.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        They must have deserted me, now I am confused and lost (Words of

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      2Be ignorant, unaware.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Balanda kabirrinan kabirriyime "oh good colour" la kabirrimayahme nadjamun

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Non-aboriginal people look (at a bark painting design) and they say "Oh good colour" but they're not aware that there is a sacred/secret meaning there.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      -kodjmayahme

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Be confused, confuse someone.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      1Animal. This word can refer to any animal.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Nawu bininj dja balanda kabirrimang nawu mayh wanjh kabirrikelebukwon kakelebukmen kabirrimarnbun kelebuk mayh bedberre.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Both Aboriginal and non-Aboriginal people get animals and tame them, the animals become tame and people turn them into their pets.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      2Rainbow Serpent.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Kakom mayh kabenemirrkmarren Dilebang.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The rainbow serpents' heads stand there facing each other at Dilebang.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      3Ceremony (refers normally in ceremonial context to either the Duwa or Yirridjdja major regional cermonial complexes)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Mayh kawokdi Mimarn.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        There will be a ceremony at Mimarn (this location for example implies a duwa ceremony).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      4A snake.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Bulanj, yidok mayh yimelmeng?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Bulanj, did you stand on a snake?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      5Hunting. When used together with a verb such as re (to go), re is used to mean 'hunting' (literally 'go for animals').

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Mayh wam.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        He's gone hunting.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Mayhmak/mayhwarre

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Good hunter/no good at hunting

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      See alsoNgalyod

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Produce a sudden flash of light (used to refer to namarrkon, lightning man).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Bird, birds (generic term).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Wait, not yet, 'hang on a bit'

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Synonymsmanjh

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Med yirrin, warde ngunnan kornobolo.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Hang on, wait, otherwise the wallaby will see you.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1Goose wing fan.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Medjek yima kanbubuhme.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Get the feather fan and fan me.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2Feathers.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            3Lateral fins on fish.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              1Kick or stand on something, touch with foot.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Bu kabbal karrire wanjh kunkih karrikihmelme wanjh kandelkke kunkih.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                When we go onto the floodplain and step in the mud, we get splashed with mud.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              2A dance style of men's foot stomping mimih dancing.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • And nungka rerre yiman mimih kahmelme mak ya mankarre and bedda rerre birriyolyolmeng and dabborrabbolk and bindimarneyimeng ngurrimelmen yiman karrimelme and mimih melmehmelmeng ya.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                People did it after in the same way mimih dance (by stomping their feet) and also songs and stories which were told to the old people/ancestors and they told them to dance just like we dance and the mimih used to dance yes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              3To call someone a kinship term.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Ngaleng korlonj ngunmelme.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                She calls you 'son'.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              See alsoKundjang melmeng.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Kunbalak1.darrkarrhme 2. dalhbonghme (to kick)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Knowledge, meaning, motive. This noun does not appear independently in this form but is incorporated into a wide variety of verbs.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Baleh kamenmenyime?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                What does it mean?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Ba bu kunubewu wanjh kakarremenmenmakmen.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                So that maybe the meaning of things will become clear.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                (Quoted in Etherington, Steve, 'Learning to be Kunwinjku: Kunwinjku people discuss their pedagogy', PhD Thesis, Charles Darwin University, 2006 )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              -menmenyime

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Mean, have a meaning.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              -menmenwakwan

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Not understand the meaning of something, have no knowledge on a topic.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Female agile wallaby.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Scientific nameMacropus agilis

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Kunbalaknjamdjorrhdjorrh

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Generic term for all butterflies.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Inside, locative 'in'.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Manih mankung ngangalkeng kure mikambe.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    I found this wild honey in an ant mound.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Ngayi kuberrk ngayo, minj ngadjare mikurrambalk.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    I'm going to sleep outside, I don't like being inside houses.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Mingarre

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    In the vine forest.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Mikurrurla

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    In the sea.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  White-bellied sea eagle.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Synonymsdjawundu

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Scientific nameHaliacetus leucogaster

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Mibbarr, djang Kurnumbidj dja Kulmarru bedberre.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    The white-bellied sea eagle is a totem for people in the Kunumbidj and Kulmarru clans.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  LanguageKune= damala, Kundjeyhmi= marrawuddi, Rembarrnga= makaka

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Mistake the identity of somebody, not recognise,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Hat yidjongburren la ngandimidbun.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Put a hat on and they won't recognise us.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  -wokmidbun

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Not recognise someone's voice, misunderstand something.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Burrow or hole belonging to burrowing animals such as goannas.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Benewam benehyawani kalawan midj, benebalwam benenang kahmidjdi, wanjh benemey kunbarlkbu, benehkarungi.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    They were looking for goanna burrows, and when they went a bit further they saw one. So then they got a digging stick and dug it out.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (Mangiru, Hannah, 'Kuhni Kayolyolme Bu Kabirriwarlbunkenh', Oenpelli Literature Production Centre, Gunbalanya, 1974 )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Kalawan munguyh mak kanyiwarlbuni ngadberre kalawan kanbukkani, midj.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    They would always take us hunting and teach us about goanna too, and the holes they dug.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (Quoted in Etherington, Steve, 'Learning to be Kunwinjku: Kunwinjku people discuss their pedagogy', PhD Thesis, Charles Darwin University, 2006 )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Other languagesKuninjku = midjno

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Cut into thin pieces (a vegetable etc.) by successively shaving pieces from the outside, pare, peel.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Korroko kobakobanj birrimilungi mankinjdjek wanjh birrimilngdjuhkeyi kore kukku wanjh bangyakmeni wanjh birrimilngwaykeyi bu birringuni.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    In the old days, people would cut cheeky yams into thin shavings, then put the shavings in water until the toxins leached out, then pull them out to eat.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Kundjaberle kunj birrimangi wanjh birrimilungi.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    They would take a kangaroo's shoulder blade and use that to cut vegetables into thin pieces.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Breathing holes of long-necked turtles, crabs etc. During the dry season long-necked turtles can be found buried beneath the mud of floodplains, obtaining oxygen through these holes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Ngalbu ngalmangiyi ngalka karrinan karrimang kore kubolkwarlahken kunred kore kabbal kayo. Morlehmorlenj daluk nawu ngad bininj birrirey kabbal mim birriyawani.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    We find long necked turtles [Chelodina rugosa] in wide open country, where there are flood plains. Women of our people would go out onto the floodplain looking for the small holes the turtles breathe through as they lie buried under the mud.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)
