                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Alive.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Ngad karrinjilngmak bu Dird kabolkwolkan, wanjh, wanjh karribolknan bu kukak, nungka kayawoyhmimbimen. […] Nungka kadjaldarrkid kanmarnbun karrimimbi mandjewk dja mandjewk.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    We are happy when the moon lights up the sky, so we can see at night. The moon comes back to life [every night]. […] He never dies, he gives us life year after year.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (Nganjmirra, Nawakadj, 'Kunwinjku Spirit', Melbourne University Press, 1997, p. 120)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Blind.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Synonymsmimdubbe

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Korroko kumekke ni nakudji nabirl dja kukmohmokni kore kubuhbuburrk nuye dja mimbunjeni minj bolknayinj.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    A long time ago, there was a crippled man living in the area. He had sores all over his body and was blind, he couldn't see a thing.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Thin spirits who live in the stone country inside cracks in the rock or caves etc. They are often mischievous and not particularly friendly. They do not venture outside of the protection of their rock environment as even a light wind can snap their fragile bones.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Grammarsee also ngal-malanjdirrihdirri, ngal

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Feel sleepy.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      LanguageKuninjku= mimkodjdje

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Not, didn't, can't.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Minj nganayinj.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        I didn't see her.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Bele ngankarrme minj bale ngayime ngadolkkan.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        I've got a cramp, I can't stand up.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      LanguageKune = marrek

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Croker Island, Minjilang (the main community on Croker Island).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Ngaye ngabolkbawong Warruwi ngawam Minjdjilang ngahni.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        I left Goulburn Island and was living on Croker Island.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Nganjmirra, Nawakadj, 'Kunwinjku Spirit', Melbourne University Press, 1997, p. 252)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Be in a group, do something as a group.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Naburlanj wam kabbal wanjh nawu djarrang dja nganabbarru mirndeyarlarrkeng.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Naburlanj went down to the floodplain, and made all the horses buffalo run off and disperse (as he walked near them).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      -mirndemonamerren

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Gather together in a large group.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      -mirndewern

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Crowd, in a crowd.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Be in large numbers, be, stand [of groups].

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Marlkawo kamirnderri ankurlahbang.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        At Marlkawo there are lots of ankurlahbang plants.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Wanjh benebokkang yimankek beneyameninj dja larrk lobmeng kore manlarrh dulkmirnderri.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Then they followed it [the emu] and tried to spear it, but it ran into an area with lots of cyprus trees.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Cutting edge, point, sharp thing, spear head.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Birridulklowkmangi mandubang kundulk birridjedmi bokko manmirrh birrimarnbuni.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        They would peel the ironwood and carve it into spear tips.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Madordak minj benmenedudjeyinj dja manbu mankole manmirrh kahdjalmirrhdi kore kundulk.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Madordak didn't bury them and the spear tips are still embedded in the tree.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Other languagesKuninjku = mirrhno

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Grammarincorporable

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      -mirrhbun

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Sharpen.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      -mirrhdi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Have a sharp edge or point.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      -mirrhdubbe

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      -mirrhmak

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Sharp.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      -mirrhmang

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Get an injection.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Facing.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Yimborledmen kanmirrkma!

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Turn facing me!

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Garde, Murray (ed.), 'Bininj Gunwok talk about health : medical terms and vocabulary for health professionals', Gundjeihmi Aboriginal Corporation, Jabiru, 2010)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      -mirrkmang

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Face someone, turn towards someone.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      -kunbidmirrk

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Palm of the hand.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      -mirrkyurrhke

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Cross someone's path, go in front of them.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      -kumirrk

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        In front of someone.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Skinny, scrawny, skeletal.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Ngalmobik.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        She is scrawny.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Yiman bu nayahwurd, yika mobik, minj kawernhkanjdi nungka kadjalwohdjobke mandjawak kunwardde kunyahwurd kunkanj dja kamunkewe ba kare kakimukmen kabalemdangen.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        If the [kangaroos] are young or skinny, without much flesh on them, he [Nakidjkidj] will just cut a little bit of meat off them with his stone knife and let them go again, so they can get big and fat.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Nganjmirra, Nawakadj, 'Kunwinjku Spirit', Melbourne University Press, 1997, p. 208)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Skewing relationship of cross cousins in the same generation to become kin in adjacent generations. Thus FZD>FZ and FZS>F. This is often done between a person and their brother's wife who is a classificatory cross-cousin (FZC, MBC). Brother's wife will be addressed as berlu FZ and her brothers will be called berlu 'F'.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Nganemodjarrkdorrinj.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        We relate to each other by virtue of cross-cousin skewing.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Kind of spike rush.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Scientific nameEleocharis sphacelata

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Manbu modjdje kundalk kadjordmen kabbal kore manlabbarl.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Spike rushes grow on floodplains, by billabongs.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Be quiet, still, calm, relaxed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Kamodme.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        He's relaxed.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Garde, Murray (ed.), 'Bininj Gunwok talk about health : medical terms and vocabulary for health professionals', Gundjeihmi Aboriginal Corporation, Jabiru, 2010)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Yimodmen, warde kannan kadberre.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Be quiet, otherwise he'll see us.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Kawk karrinan kani kore kukadjid kore kukku kaboyo kamodme djenj kamadbun kanan djenj kamre darnkih wanjh karranjbun kundang kunkeb nuye wanjh kawukme.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Rufous Night Herons stand on sandy banks by the water, waiting quietly until they see a fish come close. Then they spear them with their beaks and swallow them.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Yimodme yiman nawu bininj kahkan manme o mayh nawu kakukngorrkan, yuwn yibangmedjawan. Yidjalmodmen. Kare nungan, maydbi bu ngunburrbun ngunwon, dja bu larrk, larrk.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        You just stay quiet if a man brings food or is carrying an animal on his shoulder. Don't rush things and ask him. Just stay quiet. He'll go about and maybe he'll think of you and give you something, but if not, then it doesn't matter.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Quoted in Etherington, Steve, 'Learning to be Kunwinjku: Kunwinjku people discuss their pedagogy', PhD Thesis, Charles Darwin University, 2006)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Peaceful, quiet, still.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Nawu kuhni kayime djenj nakka munguyh kadjalyo kore kubomodmiken, minj kayo kore kahborlobme.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        That kind of fish just stays where the water is still, there aren't any around where the water is flowing.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Forbes, Brenda & Brennan, Queenie, 'Nahni Djenj: Karribolkburrbun kore karrihmanamang', Bamyili Press, Barunga, 1981)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Group, large group, whole lot, whole thing, everything.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Birrimokenbawoyi kunwarre.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        They should leave it all, its no good [i.e. intoxicating substances such as alcohol and kava].

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Karrbennan birriwern kabirrimre moken dja djarreh kore kunred kabirrimdolkan kabirrimre kondah mandjewk kabirrimulewan bu darnkih kadjakdung.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        We see lots of them [Little Curlews] coming in flocks from far away, they signal to us that the rains are about to start.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Mokenwarrhmeng, barrabarrhmeng.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        The whole thing fell down and smashed to pieces.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Secretly, without saying anything, stealthily.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Yawurrinj bu molknguni, wanjh kunukka birridungi because manekke birriburrbuni Mardayin o Ubarr o Lorrkkon.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        If any young men ate anything secretly [ceremonially restricted foods], they would get really angry with them, because they knew that Mardayin or Ubarr or Lorrkkon ceremony.
