                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Quoted in Etherington, Steve, 'Learning to be Kunwinjku: Kunwinjku people discuss their pedagogy', PhD Thesis, Charles Darwin University, 2006 )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Kaluk minj bikayhmimayi dja djangkang kunj, wanjh ngalengbu keleminj. Wanjh djahdjalni ningihni, binang kamre wanjh bimarneyimeng, "Njale ngudda kunu kanmolkbawong?"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        But he didn't call back to her, he was off hunting kangaroos. She got frightened. So she just stayed sitting there, and when she heard him coming back she said "Why did you just sneak off (without saying anything)?"

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Gumurdul, Julie, 'Mamamh dja kakkak benewam djenj', in Manakgu, Andrew et. al. 'Kabirrihwarlbun', Oenpelli Literary Project, 1974)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      -molknan

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Spy, watch secretly.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Open up to obtain food, mostly used to refer to opening a tree to extract wild honey. Also to open up an animal by butchering it. Can be used as a threat to another person in a fight.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Daluk bokenh benewam beneyawani mankung, wanjh benengalkeng kubbulak kore kundulk. Benedulkngadji, wanjh benemonbuhmeng beneyiwkmey.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Two women went looking for honey, and found some kubbulak honey in a tree. They cut open the tree and got the honey.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Yidjare kukkurrme monbuhme!

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        You want me to kill you and cut you open!

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Spirit being, dangerous to humans.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Nani nawu nayungki ngad karringeybun, bininj, yo nakka kanhnguyi nabang nabang,

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        He is someone from creation times, we call him (like that), a human form but he eats people, and he's dangerous, very dangerous, Mongerrh is like a spirit.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Mongerrk benbenenang daluk bokenh. Bedda benedanginj. Benehnguni mankarralarlhmanj.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Mongerrk saw the two women. They were sisters, and they were eating seeds from the peanut tree (Sterculia quadrifida).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Nganjmirra, Nawakadj, 'Kunwinjku Spirit', Melbourne University Press, 1997)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Blowfly/blowfly maggot, exceptionally large flies which follow evil spirits.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Mother's older sisters (MeZ). These sisters can reciprocally address the children of their younger sister in the same way.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Other languagesKune,Kundedjnjenghmi = murla

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Group of women, women, middle-aged women

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "Bu morlehmorlenj kabirriwurlebme kumekke kunred, wanjh kabirrimerlemmen, kabirriyawmang bokenh wurdyaw." Lumaluma bimarneyimeng.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • "If women swim at that place, they will become pregnant, they will give birth to twins", said Lumaluma.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            (Nganjmirra, Nawakadj, 'Kunwinjku Spirit', Melbourne University Press, 1997)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Kunbalakkardukardu

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Grammarplural noun

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Sit on, ride on, be on top of.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Korroko konda nawu bininj birrimorneni nawu djarrang birrilobmi djarrang dorrengh birridulubuni nawu nganabbarru.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            In the past, the people here would ride horses and shoot buffalo while riding.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          See alsomorneyerrkan

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Pick up many small objects from the ground, a typical example is fruit.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Yerre bimurrngmoyhmey bimurrngkurrmeng kore kahwodjruhrurrk ba kunmalng nuye karrurndeng kore kunred nuye.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            After that she picked up his bones and placed them inside a hollow log coffin, so that his spirit could return to his homeland.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            (Nganjmirra, Nawakadj, 'Kunwinjku Spirit', Melbourne University Press, 1997)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Countryman, family, relalatives (incorporated noun that requires a pronoun prefix such as karri-, ngane-, etc).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Synonymskarrikadjurren

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Nganemud.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            We two are countrymen.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          See alsonamud

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Truck, car.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Other languagesKune = muddikang

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Etymologyfrom English 'motor car'

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Generic term for various small dasyurid and other similar small mammals such as delicate mouse, Kakadu pebble mouse, fawn antechinus, sandstone false antechinus, grassland melomys, the common rock rat and the brush-tailed rabbit-rat. Some speakers also call some of these small mammals djirrkkinj or in Kune djirrkkinj.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Scientific namePseudomys delicatus, Pseudomys calabyi, Antechinus bellus, Pseudatechinus bilarni, Melomys burtoni, Zyzomys argurus, Conilurus penicillatus

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Relate information, tell, inform. This word is also used to describe plants, animals or natural phenomena which 'tell' something about distant events or are a sign of something such as seasonal changes, the existence of a sacred site etc.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Kabirri-marne-mulewarren.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                They tell each other.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Nangale mulewam?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Who related that news?

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Kano warde mulewan.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                When the old people see dragonflies, they say OK, that means there are lots of fish (ready to be caught).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation.)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              1Ceremonial feast. At the completion of most large regional ceremonies, the public proceedings conclude with a large meal that everyone shares in.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                2 A ceremony or celebration that is public as opposed to sacred.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Mahni mandule karrbarda minj mandjamun yiman kayime 'ceremony' duninjh bininj kabirriwayini dja daluk larrk kabirridjalborrkke kunkurdu. Kore yiman mulil dja wurdwurd kabindibukkan kore school.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The Karrbarda [Long Yam] song is not sacred like a real ceremony, men sing and women just dance the moves. Like in public ceremonies, or they show it to the children at school.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                3Lots of, heaps of, a big mob of [colloquial, extended from the idea of abundance at a ceremonial feast]

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Kondah kawarre, mulil. […] "Yuwn balanda yidjalmarrkebbun, kunwarre. Wardi yingan yirohrokmen," ngayimeng.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  It's not good here, there's a huge mob [of non-Indigenous people]. […] I said, "Don't just leave it all up to those balanda. That's no good. You should try to do it yourself."

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Quoted in Etherington, Steve, 'Learning to be Kunwinjku: Kunwinjku people discuss their pedagogy', PhD Thesis, Charles Darwin University, 2006 )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                -mulilmang

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Stage a ceremonial feast.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Carry a bag with the strap or string around the forehead or the neck, with the bag hanging down on the back.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Kunkare ngalbadjan dja ngalyaw benewarlbom, dja kundjabarrk bokenh benebebbehmundikani.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  A long time ago, a mother and her daughter went hunting. They each carried their own string bag, hanging at their back.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Ngalmakgu Nabobbob, 'Ngalbadjan dja ngalyaw benewarlbuni kunkurlurrk' in "Kunwinjku Stories", Oenpelli Literature Production Centre, Gunbalanya, 1982)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Innocent, not to blame.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Ngayi wanjh ngamungu.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Well I'm not to blame.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Nungka namungu birridjuhbom bu ngaye ngandidjuhbuyi.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  They blamed that innocent man when they should have blamed me.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Nawirridj, Grace & Rowe, Meryl (eds), "Man of Sorrow" in 'Karriburlume God: Kunwinjku Song Book', Gunbalanya, 1985, p. 12)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                1For an extended length of time, continually. Extended (length or time).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Nawu wurdyaw yimeng "Djak nganbayeng." Wanjh nalkbuni munguyh nawu wurdyaw.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  The child said "An ant bit me". And he just kept on crying continually, that child.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Dakgalawuy, Nancy, 'Wurdyaw dirrihdirri' in 'Kunwinjku Stories', Oenpelli Literature Production Centre, Gunbalanya, 1982)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                2Repeated action, keep doing something.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Ngangadjihbun munguyh, kunubewu kebdjirned nganhmang.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  I keep sneezing, maybe I'm getting a cold.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  (Jill Nganjmirra )

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                GrammarNot incorporable.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                -munguyhmunguyh

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Forever, permanently.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Follow after, follow someone's leading or direction; follow the style or example of another.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Ngad karrimunkekadjung namekke bininj.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  We all are following after that man.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Send.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  -munkewerren

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Part ways, go in different directions.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Dark, without light.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Bolkmunun minj nganan.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    It's a dark place, I can't see.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Black flying fox. Associated with duwa moiety.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Scientific namePteropus alecto

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Other languagesKundjeyhmi = nangamu

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Kunbalakdjingkorrk

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Mother's brother (of referent).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Nanih nabadjan biyawmey.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      This is his uncle here, the one whose sister gave birth to him (or 'is in his upper adjacent generation matriline').

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Male subsection or 'skin' name of duwa patri-moiety and duwa matri-moiety. Equivalent to duwa in the eastern system.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      LanguageKunwinjku, Kundjeyhmi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Other languagesKuninjku, Kune, Kundedjnjenghmi = kamarrang

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Nabarlek (also known as the little rock wallaby).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Scientific namePeradorcus concinna

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Kunbalakdolhwarr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1From.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Birrimwam Manawukan beh.
