                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          They came from Maningrida.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2Away a bit further.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Beh karrire.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Let's just go over there.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        3Demonstrative with gender prefix indicating both referential and locational immediacy 'that one who has just been mentioned, just over there'.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Nabeh kahdi.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Him (the person just mentioned), he's just over there.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • A: Kamarrang kahdi? B: Nabeh.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A: Is Kamarrang here? B: He's just over there.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        LanguageKune, Kuninjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        See alsoSee also -bewh (W)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        1Husband, spouse.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Kunkareni kohbahkohbanj bokenh nabininjkobeng dja ngalbininjkobeng benekarrmi nakudji duruk nawu nabangni.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A long time ago, there were two old people, a husband and wife, who owned a dangerous dog.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          (Manakgu, Andrew, 'Nakudji wurdyaw bibayeng duruk' iin 'Kunwinjku Stories', Oenpelli Literature Production Centre, Gunbalanya, 1982)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        2Mate (male mate of female animal).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Merlbbe daluk ngalkka nabininjkobeng ngalengarre warradjangkal.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Merlbbe is a female agile wallaby, and her mate is the male agile wallaby, warradjangkal.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Man with a physical disability, crippled man.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Korroko kumekke ni nakudji nabirl dja kukmohmokni kore kubuhbuburrk nuye dja mimbunjeni minj bolknayinj.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          A long time ago, there was a crippled man living in the area. He had sores all over his body and he was blind, he couldn't see a thing.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        -birlmen

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Become crippled, get leprosy.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        A type of wild honey often found in the ground, produced by native stingless bees identified as Tetragonula mellipes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          LanguageKuninjku, Kunwinjku, Kundedjnjenghmi, Kundjeyhmi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Other languagesKune = modjarnh

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Kunbalakbardmarneyi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Male subsection or 'skin' name of duwa patri-moiety and duwa

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            LanguageKunwinjku, Kundjeyhmi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Other languagesKuninjku, Kune, Kundedjnjenghmi = kela

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Whirlwind.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              LanguageKune= nawurlam, bidj˙rru

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Sail-fin glass fish and other species of glassfish.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Synonymsbeddem

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Scientific nameAmbassis agrammus, Ambassis mulleri and Ambassis macleayi.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Look after, watch over, care for, look out for.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  He, him, it, that.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Dja nahni kakarrme danjbik kunka yiman namardaka, dja nakanjmak bu karringun.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    And it [the salmon catfish] has three spines like an eel-tailed catfish, and its flesh is good eating.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    (Forbes, Brenda & Brennan, Queenie, 'Nahni Djenj: Karribolkburrbun kore karrihmanamang', Bamyili Press, Barunga, 1981)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Male subsection name or 'skin' name of yirridjdja moiety and yirridjdja matri-moiety. Equivalent to yirridjdja in the eastern system.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    LanguageKuninjku,Kune=bangardi.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Male subsection or 'skin' name of yirridjdja patri-moiety and mardku matri-moiety. Equivalent to mardku in the eastern system.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      LanguageKunwinjku, Kundjeyhmi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Other languagesKuninjku, Kune, Kundedjnjenghmi = bulanj

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Little red flying fox.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Scientific namePteropus scapulatus

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Kunbalakdjingkorrk

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Mother's mother's brother, non-vocative form of kakkak. One's matrilineal parallel grandkin.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          Other languagesKuninjku = nadjongmiken

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          He/it.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Male subsection or 'skin' name of duwa patri-moiety and duwa matri-moiety. Equivalent to duwa in the eastern system.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Synonymswamud

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              LanguageKunwinjku, Kundjeyhmi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Other languagesKuninjku, Kune, Kundedjnjenghmi =wamud

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Old man.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                See alsokobahkobanj, kobokohbanj, kobohkobanj, kobohbanj, kohbahkohbanj, kobakohbanj

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                GrammarThere is great variation in the plural forms of this noun which dispenses with the noun class prefix. This means the plural form no longer explicitly marks gender (i.e. a group of elderly males, females or mixed gender group).

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                -kohbanjmen

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Grow old.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                Son-in-law (of female), mother's brother of actual or classificatory spouse, 'cousin', MMBS, MMBSSS. The address term (vocative form) is nakurrngh.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Circumcised boy.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Other languagesKuninjku = lakkayenno

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Cry, weep.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Bu Nawalabik bibom Nangordyawok doweng wanjh ngalbadjan nuye Nangordyawok nalkirey bu durndehdurndengi kore kakbi namud ngalengarre.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      When Nawalabik killed Nangordyawok, Nangordyawok's mother went back crying to her family in the north.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    See alsoNalkiduhdurndi.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Wedge-tailed eagle.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Scientific nameAquila audax

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Nawu namaddorl nakka mayhmayh nakimuk nungan kareddi kore kaddum kuwarde. Namaddorl nakka muddjuyh dja walakkih mudburlerri.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      The Wedge-Tailed Eagle is a big bird which nests high up in the rocky country. Its feathers are brown and also black in parts.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      (Andrew Manakgu, Injalak Arts painting documentation)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    LanguageKundjeyhmi, Kunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Other languagesKunwinjku = kayimarri, Kuninjku =milarrhwaken

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Grandfather, mother's father, non-vocative form of mamamh.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • "Yoh," yimeng ngal-bininjkobeng, "dja nawu wurdwurd bokenh karridjarrkre?" Kornkumo yimeng, "Burrkyak, birridin Ngalkinbalen dja Namanjmiken, dja ngarre mankung, dja kunj ngawarlbun."

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      "Yes", said his wife, "Should we all go together, with the two kids?". But the father said "No, they can stay with grandma and grandpa, the two of us can go looking for wild honey and I'll go hunting for kangaroo".

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      (Maralngurra, Rachel, 'Wurdwurd Bedberre', C.M.S, Gunbalanya, 1974)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    See alsomamam

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Black eel-tailed catfishes.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Scientific nameNeosilurus spp., egs. Neosilurus ater, Neosilurus argenteus, Neosilurus hyrtlii, |fs{but also} Cinetodus froggatti, Anodontiglanis dahli.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Namardaka nakimuk dja marrngunj nayahwurd.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      "Namardaka" is a large catfish, and "marrngunj" is a small one.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Other languagesKundedjnjenghmi, Kuninjku, Kune = bikkurr

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Kunbalaknakeryi

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Mythological lightning spirit.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Yimang kundjila wardi namorden karrong.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Get the axe otherwise the lightning will strike it. (It is said that axes left out in a storm will attract

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    LanguageKunwinjku

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Matrimoiety name.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Malevolent spirit being. When used with the verb kabiwe, it means 'to have a fit', literally 'he/she is thrown by a bad spirit'.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Aa nakka bininj kabihbun namarlbbe.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Ah, that man is having a fit!

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        (Jill Nganjmirra)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      Profane spirit, malevolent spirit.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Murderer, can also imply someone who kills people by sorcery.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Bininj nawu Namarndeyi.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          The Murderer [title of a story in 'Kunbalak : stories for Kunwinjku young people in Mother-in-law language, ordinary Kunwinjku and English']

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          (Manakgu, Andrew, 'Kunbalak : stories for Kunwinjku young people in Mother-in-law language, ordinary Kunwinjku and English', Kunwinjku Language Centre, Gunbalanya, 1996, pp. 24-27)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Nakka namarndeyi, wardi kanbun.
